item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: SOURCES Our code of conduct is inspired by the common standards and language set for summer schools and scientific meetings worldwide.

item.title: COVID Policy
item.description: Reading Resource: https://www.gov.za/coronavirus FOR ALL ATTENDEES: All international travellers arriving at operating South African airports must provide a valid certificate of a negative COVID-19 test, recognised by the World Health Organization, which was obtained not more than 72 hours before the date of travel.
